feed.title: Ente Auth Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Ente Auth: auth-v4.2.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [auth] Update simple-icons by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4477
  • [auth] Make "Ente Auth" at the top of app similar to marketing images/Photos app by @dnred in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4469
  • [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4472
  • [auth] Remove hardcoded accounts url by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4491
  • [auth] Reduce progress bar refresh rate on Desktop to lower CPU usage by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4517

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/auth-v4.2.0...auth-v4.2.1

entry.title: New release for Ente Auth: auth-v4.2.2

entry.title: New release for Ente Auth: auth-v4.2.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [auth] add caixa icon by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4551
  • [auth] Update Amazon icon by @tanguylegazon in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4554
  • [auth] Adding icon for Belo by @alanmoyano in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4548
  • [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4539
  • [auth] Fix progress bar by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4564
  • [auth] Ctrl+F to activate search tab by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4552
  • [auth] Export Code Lockscreen fix by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4571
  • [auth] Dragable scrollbar for long scrolling list of codes by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4583
  • [auth] Fix key binding for search focus on mac by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4584

New Contributors

  • @alanmoyano made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4548

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/auth-v4.2.2...auth-v4.2.3

entry.title: New release for Ente Auth: auth-v4.2.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [auth] Fix ~/.cache being deleted on linux by @gepbird in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4597
  • [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4605
  • Add Custom Icon for PostScan Mail by @NanoBunTV in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4593
  • [auth] Add Newgrounds icon by @clownmedy in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4600
  • [auth] add padding to the generated QR code image to prevent coner eyâ€¦ by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4591
  • Fix Belo icon displaying as a violet square instead of the correct icon by @alanmoyano in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4619
  • [mob][auth] Add certificate fingerprint by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4632
  • [auth] Fix 2fas import by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4663
  • [auth] Bump version & hide import from gallery for external users by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4664
  • [auth][mob] Gracefully handle registration error by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4666
  • [auth] Update flatpak version by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4668

New Contributors

  • @gepbird made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4597
  • @clownmedy made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4600

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/auth-v4.2.3...auth-v4.2.4

entry.title: New release for Ente Auth: auth-v4.2.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4675
  • [auth] Enable translation for more languages by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4674
  • [auth] Fix app bar Icon spacing by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4681
  • [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4689
  • [Auth] Add Fastmail logo by @jbelien in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4685
  • [auth] Adding 2 new custom icons for AzurHosts, MineNode and AzurWare by @YoannDev90 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4678
  • [auth] Fix privacy screen color for dark mode by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4696
  • [auth] Update auth ios icon by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4698
  • [auth] Use issuerName as default sort key by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4699
  • [auth] fix generic icon not updating when issuer name is changed by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4705
  • [auth] Fix content not scrolling when font size set to large by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4700
  • [auth] Fix logo for Enom by @ludespeedny in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4707
  • [auth] Update version by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4708
  • [auth] Update Github build action by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4709
  • [auth] Update Github build action by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4710
  • [auth] Fix workflow for Ubuntu build by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4711
  • [auth] Fix export with invalid algo name by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4712

New Contributors

  • @jbelien made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4685
  • @YoannDev90 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4678

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/auth-v4.2.4...auth-v4.2.7
